wikipedia_page.main:
Adam Warren (born 7 March 1991) is a Wales international rugby union player currently playing for the Dragons. His position is at centre.
Warren came through the youth ranks at Llangennech. After a storming debut season in the First XV he won the 2009-2010 player of the season award and earned himself a move to Llandovery for the 2010-2011 season and he progressed to the Scarlets regional team. In June 2015 he joined the Dragons.

response: *Adam Warren (born 1991), rugby union Welsh international playing for Dragons

Of the current players Ollie Griffiths, Leon Brown, Elliot Dee, Aaron Wainwright, Jonah Holmes, Ross Moriarty, Ben Carter, Taine Basham and Will Rowlands have featured in Wales test matches whilst with the region. Tavis Knoyle, Adam Warren, Richard Hibbard, Aaron Jarvis, Rhodri Williams, Sam Davies, Jamie Roberts and Dan Baker achieved Wales international caps before joining the Dragons as did Gonzalo Bertranou for Argentina.
* Four players made their full international debuts for Wales: Rhodri Jones, Harry Robinson, Liam Williams and Adam Warren.
